rules_text:
Menace
During your turn, you may tap untapped artifacts you control to crew Vehicles as though they were creatures with 2 power.
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
notes: 2.1.0: Lost legendary status since Junks was coming in. Should also make this feel better to put multiples of especially since it’s almost exclusive to the rakdos deck. Also changed discount to smaller but more consistent since it was too infrequent before.
